input.name: guidelines_to_check
input.description: string containing the name of the guideline that should be used to generate in the form: guideline_version1_version2

input.name: apache
input.description: Configuration type for generator. Default to True (apache), if false nginx will be used

input.name: config_output
input.description: The path and name of the output file

description: This modules generates a configuration file after one guideline.
